name: Extra Real Natural Evolution
description:
A shmup (shoot-em-up) without the shooting part - Fly in the sky and hit evil alien monsters with crabs, evolved from Earth. Your score will help evolve your crabs to stronger crabs, educating you about diverse species of crustaceans and their gameplay stats. (This edutainment is not meant to be taken seriously, but no crab species in the game is fictional)


A ghost crab evolving because of its evolution points, just like real life

This game was made in about a week to celebrate my good friend Frankiesmileshow's birthday.

Design and programming by TheMonstreKing
Chiptune music by Cboyardee
Sound effects and song by Lurdiak

  • Your playstyle will affect the evolution of your crabs, branching from the
  • Three entire enemy types to fight, along with a powerful boss
  • Enemies will get stronger and faster as you progress. Be careful!
